summary: A tycoon goes undercover to ferret out agitators at a department store, but gets involved in their lives instead.
cast: Jean Arthur|Robert Cummings|Charles Coburn|Edmund Gwenn|Spring Byington|S.Z. Sakall|William Demarest|Walter Kingsford|Montagu Love|Richard Carle|Charles Waldron|Edwin Maxwell|Edward McNamara|Robert Emmett Keane|Florence Bates|Charles Irwin|Matt McHugh|Julie Warren|Ilene Brewer|Regis Toomey|Pat Moriarity|Brooks Benedict|Irving Cummings|Carol Dietrich|Minta Durfee|William Elmer|Fern Emmett|Pat Flaherty|Jack Gargan|Edna Hall|Kenner G. Kemp|Mike Lally|Frank Mills|Tom Miscari|Garry Owen|Victor Potel|Suzanne Ridgway|Nicholas Soussanin|Will Stanton|Amzie Strickland|Walter Tetley|Lucio Villegas
title: El diablo burlado
